techmeme.title: Vantage Data Centers raised $1.6B from GIC and the Abu Dhabi Investment Authority to expand in APAC, including the acquisition of a Malaysian data center campus (Bloomberg)
Atlantic Council: the number of US-based investors in spyware companies nearly tripled in 2024 to 31, compared to just 11 in 2023, topping Israel's 26 investors (Vas Panagiotopoulos/Wired)
Blockchain-based lender Figure and some of its backers raised $787.5M in an IPO, selling 31.5M shares at $25 each, valuing the company at about $5.3B (Bloomberg)
Sensor Tower: as of July 2025, Rapido had 50M MAUs on Android in India, above Uber's 30M; in the four-wheeler cab segment, Rapido has a ~30% share and Uber ~50% (Pranav Mukul/The Economic Times)
Ant Group unit Robbyant showcases its first LLM-powered humanoid robot, the R1, at a conference in Shanghai, joining an intensifying effort by Chinese companies (Lulu Yilun Chen/Bloomberg)
